name: Metal Gear Solid Integral (DLC)
description:
Introducing the elements added to the integral version!

  • The Complete Version, surpassing the previous Director's Cut & International Version
  • VR TRAINING has achieved the ultimate evolution!
    Another game disc independent of the main story!
  • The long-awaited English dubbed version (With optional Japanese subtitles or English subtitles)
    Kojima approved, with Hollywood-esq enthusiastic performances!
  • All 5 ranks of difficulty, for beginners to advanced players
  • Challenging the limits of real-time full polygons
    Witness the super beautiful 3D models of Naomi & Mei Ling!
  • Compatible with PocketStation. Perform top secret missions, moveable in subjective mode for a new sense of tension!
  • Rearranged placement of enemy soldiers!
  • Commentary from the staff on the 8th frequency radio
  • Includes preview videos announced at the Tokyo Game Show, E3, etc.
